list.name: Status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster = 'keystone'

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'keystone' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^5/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'GET' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'POST' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'PUT' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'DELETE' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_check_api" WHERE "service" = 'keystone-public-api' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^2/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^1/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^3/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^4/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^5/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "backend" = 'keystone-public-api' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "backend" = 'keystone-admin-api' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "backend" = 'keystone-public-api' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "backend" = 'keystone-admin-api' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_users" WHERE "state" = 'enabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_users" WHERE "state" = 'enabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_tenants" WHERE "state" = 'enabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_keystone_tenants" WHERE "state" = 'enabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from pacemaker_local_resource_active with key = hostname
